languages.text: Магос Доминус Оптикон-22 был направлен конклавом флота в передовую разведывательную эскадру. Причиной тому была открывшаяся поддержка идей Прерывания Цикла, которую он тайно хранил в своих вычислительных блоках. В исследовательском рейде его корабль бесследно исчез.
languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как Лоялист или был убит в квесте

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.
languages.original_text: Магос Доминус Оптикон-22 был направлен конклавом флота в передовую разведывательную эскадру. Причиной тому была открывшаяся поддержка идей Прерывания Цикла, которую он тайно хранил в своих вычислительных блоках. В исследовательском рейде его корабль бесследно исчез.

traits.locale_text: Magos Dominius Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason was the discovered support for the Discontinuing the Cycle views, which he secretly stored in his computing blocks. His ship disappeared without a trace in one of the research raids.

Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

languages.text: 真理开拓者舰队密会在统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号的计算模块中，发现了他秘密储存的数据，用来支持循环终止。于是密会将奥普蒂孔22号调往前方的侦查中队，而他的舰船也在某次调查突袭中消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: 真理开拓者舰队密会在统御贤者奥普蒂孔22号的计算模块中，发现了他秘密储存的数据，用来支持循环终止。于是密会将奥普蒂孔22号调往前方的侦查中队，而他的舰船也在某次调查突袭中消失得无影无踪。

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 wurde von der Flottenkonklave dem Aufklärungsgeschwader zugewiesen. In seinen Computerblocks waren nämlich versteckte Daten gefunden werden, die bewiesen, dass er die Unterbrechung des Zyklus unterstützte. Sein Schiff verschwand bei einem Einsatz spurlos.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 wurde von der Flottenkonklave dem Aufklärungsgeschwader zugewiesen. In seinen Computerblocks waren nämlich versteckte Daten gefunden werden, die bewiesen, dass er die Unterbrechung des Zyklus unterstützte. Sein Schiff verschwand bei einem Einsatz spurlos.

languages.text: Le magos dominus Opticon-22 fut envoyé en mission à bord d'un escadron de reconnaissance par le conclave de la flotte. Cette décision fut prise à la suite de la découverte de données en faveur de l'Interruption du Cycle dissimulées dans ses blocs mémoriels. Son vaisseau disparut sans laisser de trace au cours d'une mission de recherche.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: Le magos dominus Opticon-22 fut envoyé en mission à bord d'un escadron de reconnaissance par le conclave de la flotte. Cette décision fut prise à la suite de la découverte de données en faveur de l'Interruption du Cycle dissimulées dans ses blocs mémoriels. Son vaisseau disparut sans laisser de trace au cours d'une mission de recherche.

languages.text: El cónclave de la Flota envió al magos Dominus Opticon-22 al escuadrón de reconocimiento. El motivo de este traslado fue el descubrimiento del apoyo que almacenó en secreto en sus bloques computacionales hacia la Discontinuación del Ciclo. Su nave desapareció sin dejar rastro en una incursión de investigación.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: El cónclave de la Flota envió al magos Dominus Opticon-22 al escuadrón de reconocimiento. El motivo de este traslado fue el descubrimiento del apoyo que almacenó en secreto en sus bloques computacionales hacia la Discontinuación del Ciclo. Su nave desapareció sin dejar rastro en una incursión de investigación.

languages.text: マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は、艦隊の評議会によって前方偵察隊に送られた。その理由は、彼がコンピューティングブロックに密かに保存していた「サイクルを断ち切る」ためのサポートが発見されたからだった。彼の船は調査隊の襲撃により、跡形もなく姿を消した。
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: マゴス・ドミヌス・オプティコン-22は、艦隊の評議会によって前方偵察隊に送られた。その理由は、彼がコンピューティングブロックに密かに保存していた「サイクルを断ち切る」ためのサポートが発見されたからだった。彼の船は調査隊の襲撃により、跡形もなく姿を消した。

languages.text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, filo meclisi tarafından dış keşif eskadrasına gönderildi. Sebebi, işlem bloklarında Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu inanışına olan desteğini gizlice ihtiva edişinin keşfedilmesiydi. Gemisi, bir araştırma görevi sırasında geride iz bırakmadan kayboldu.
languages.original_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22 was sent to the forward scouting squadron by the fleet conclave. The reason for this was the discovery of the support he secretly stored in his computing blocks for the Discontinuing of the Cycle. His ship disappeared without a trace in a research raid.

traits.locale_text: Magos Dominus Opticon-22, filo meclisi tarafından ileri hat keşif eskadrasına gönderildi. Bunun sebebi, işlem bloklarında, Döngü'nün Süreğini Bozma inanışına dair desteğini gizlice ihtiva ediyor oluşunun keşfedilmesiydi. Gemisi, bir araştırma görevi sırasında iz bırakmadan yok oldu.

languages.translation_comment: Паскаль закончил квест как Лоялист или был убит в квесте
